PSCT.Base: While face-up on the field, this card is also WIND-Attribute. You can only use each of the following effects of "Simorgh, Bird of Perfection" once per turn. During your Main Phase, if you Normal or Special Summon a Winged Beast monster(s): You can reveal this card in your hand; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Simorgh" monster. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Simorgh" monster from your Deck to the GY; add 1 "Simorgh" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
